II Department für Informatik Wirtschaftsinformatik - Umwelt und Nachhaltigkeit Prof. Dr. Philipp Staudt Prof. Dr. Philipp Staudt Green Information Systems, Energy Information Systems, Smart Grid Economics, Energy Economics, Behavioral Experiments, Decision Support Systems, Sustainable Platform Economy Department für Informatik  (» Postanschrift) Carl von Ossietzky Universität Oldenburg Ammerländer Heerstraße 114-118 26129 Oldenburg uol.de/informatikIndustriestraße 11, R006 (» Adresse und Lageplan)Nach Absprache - By appointment - Google Scholar - LinkedIn Prof. Dr. Philipp Staudt Philipp Staudt is a professor for Information Systems with a focus on digital sustainability and digital technology for sustainability. He has extensively researched the energy transition and the integration of renewable resources in the energy market using digital technology. He also works on understanding the impact of information systems on organizational sustainability and the impact of digital sustainability on government and society.
